[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@secured-finance/lib-base](./lib-base.md) &gt; [SendableProtocol](./lib-base.sendableprotocol.md)

## SendableProtocol interface

Send transactions.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface SendableProtocol<R = unknown, S = unknown> extends _SendableFrom<TransactableProtocol, R, S> 
```
**Extends:** \_SendableFrom&lt;[TransactableProtocol](./lib-base.transactableprotocol.md)<!-- -->, R, S&gt;

## Remarks

The functions return an object implementing [SentProtocolTransaction](./lib-base.sentprotocoltransaction.md)<!-- -->, which can be used to monitor the transaction and get its details when it succeeds.

Implemented by [SendableEthers](./lib-ethers.sendableethers.md)<!-- -->.
